perturbation.original_text:
In the event that Oceanic Time Warner Cable removes the above content and or terminates this agreement prior to December 31, 2006, Oceanic Time
Warner Cable agrees to pay a cancellation fee of Five Thousand Dollars ($5,000) per month multiplied by the number of months remain on the
agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: In the event that Oceanic Time Warner Cable removes the above content and/or terminates this agreement, Oceanic Time Warner Cable may be subject to a cancellation fee.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific cancellation fee amount and calculation method, the modified text creates uncertainty. While it still mentions a 'cancellation fee,' the absence of defined terms makes enforcement highly ambiguous. The original clause stipulates a clear financial penalty for early termination, while the modified clause introduces a discretionary element.

perturbation.original_text:
Oceanic Time Warner Cable will include the following disclaimer on the Watchit Content: “The materials shown are for entertainment purposes only
and does not provide any guarantees of winning or improving your odds of winning on this program. The rules of the games as shown may not
apply to all properties and may change from time to time.”
perturbation.changed_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will include a disclaimer on the Watchit Content.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific wording of the disclaimer, but still mandating that *a* disclaimer be present creates an ambiguity. Without the specifics, it's unclear what the disclaimer should say and introduces uncertainty. Section 7 of the original text clearly dictates the language of the disclaimer, and this clause is now absent, leaving room for interpretation.

perturbation.original_text:
Watchit shall have the exclusive right to sell third party advertising as sponsors of their content and will have the right to brand the content under
the Watchit brand and place a “bug” on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark.
perturbation.changed_text: Watchit will have the right to brand the content.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the section referring to Watchit's exclusive right to sell third-party advertising, the agreement is perturbed. If another clause in the agreement mentions how revenue from advertising will be split, it will directly contradict the modified section in paragraph 6. The modified clause does not restrict Oceanic Time Warner Cable from selling advertising, creating ambiguity around who controls ad sales.
